text: Ellen Cawker is a former South African international lawn bowler and national team manager. ==Bowls career== Cawker was born in 1946 in Perth, Scotland but emigrated to Rhodesia in 1956 and won the silver medal in the women's pairs with Jill Hackland at the 2002 Commonwealth Games in Manchester. She retired from international competition after the Commonwealth Games and then served as South Africa team manager until 2007 but still plays for the Margate Bowls Club. She won the 2010 fours at the National Championships bowling for the Margate Bowls Club. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1946 births Category:South African female bowls players Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for South Africa Category:Bowls players at the 2002 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for South Africa
title: Ellen Cawker
